title: MD5 Hash Calculation Module
description:
MD5_STR a string of the MD5 hash can be calculated by. In the STR a

string is passed to the module, and a positive edge at input "RUN", the

calculation starts. DONE is immediately reset at startup, and after the pro￾cess is DONE is set to TRUE. Then, at the parameter HASH the actual cal￾culated HASH value is available. (See module MD5-STREAM).
name: CalculateMD5
